CustomField.description: The General Accounting Unit this Allocation is attributed to. Only General Accounting Units marked as active are available for new Allocations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The General Accounting Unit this Allocation is attributed to. Only General Accounting Units marked as active are available for new Allocations.
CustomField.label: General Accounting Unit

lookupFilter.errorMessage: Choose an active General Accounting Unit for this Allocation. You cannot modify an Allocation assigned to an inactive General Accounting Unit.
lookupFilter.infoMessage: You must select an active General Accounting Unit for this Allocation.
